channel.title: Fireside Chats about Management and Leadership
channel.description: A lively collection of conversations with business leaders and experts about focus, management, leadership, and success.

image.title: Fireside Chats about Management and Leadership

channel.itunes:author: Lisa Haneberg
channel.itunes:summary: A lively collection of conversations with business leaders and experts about focus, management, leadership, and success.
channel.itunes:subtitle: Conversations with business leaders and interesting thinkers.

item.title: Podcast with John Kay
item.description: During this 24 minutes podcast, Lisa Haneberg (www.managementcraft.com) interviews John Kay, author of Obliquity: Why Our Goals are Best Achieved Indirectly.
item.itunes:author: Lisa Haneberg
item.itunes:summary: During this 24 minutes podcast, Lisa Haneberg (www.managementcraft.com) interviews John Kay, author of Obliquity: Why Our Goals are Best Achieved Indirectly.

item.title: Podcast with Craig and Patricia Neal
item.description: During this 20 minute podcast, Lisa Haneberg (www.lisahaneberg.com) chats with Craig and Patricia Neal, coauthors of The Art if Convening: Authentic Engagement in Meetings, Gatherings, and Conversations.
item.itunes:author: Lisa Haneberg
item.itunes:summary: During this 20 minute podcast, Lisa Haneberg (www.lisahaneberg.com) chats with Craig and Patricia Neal, coauthors of The Art if Convening: Authentic Engagement in Meetings, Gatherings, and Conversations.

item.title: Chat with Francois Gossieaux
item.description: During this 30 minute podcast, Lisa Haneberg chats with Francois Gossieaux, coauthor of The Hyper-Social Organization.
item.itunes:author: Lisa Haneberg
item.itunes:summary: During this 30 minute podcast, Lisa Haneberg chats with Francois Gossieaux, coauthor of The Hyper-Social Organization.

item.title: Chat with Dr. Ellen Weber
item.description: During this 25 minute podcast, Lisa Haneberg chats with Dr. Ellen Weber about applications of brain plasticity in improving performance at work.
item.itunes:author: Lisa Haneberg
item.itunes:summary: During this 25 minute podcast, Lisa Haneberg chats with Dr. Ellen Weber about applications of brain plasticity in improving performance at work.
item.itunes:subtitle: Brain Power and Breakthroughs

item.title: Podcast with Mark Levy
item.description: During this 33 minute podcast, Lisa Haneberg (www.managementcraft.com) chats with Mark Levy, author of Accidental Genius: Using Writing to Generate Your Best Ideas, Insight, and Content.
item.itunes:author: Lisa Haneberg
item.itunes:summary: During this 33 minute podcast, Lisa Haneberg (www.managementcraft.com) chats with Mark Levy, author of Accidental Genius: Using Writing to Generate Your Best Ideas, Insight, and Content.

item.title: Podcast with Steve Farber - Leadership Love
item.description: During this 23 minute podcast Lisa Haneberg chats with Steve Farber about how leaders show their love in the workplace.
item.itunes:author: Lisa Haneberg
item.itunes:summary: During this 23 minute podcast Lisa Haneberg chats with Steve Farber about how leaders show their love in the workplace.
